name: Improvisational Defender
summary: You are always prepared for fights that frequently disrupt seemingly peaceful times.
description:
You are always prepared for fights that frequently disrupt seemingly peaceful times. When you use an improvised weapon or a shoddy weapon, you don’t take the –2 item penalty to attack rolls.Improvisational Defender Leads To...
